name: Medogan
description:
STRANDED IN YOUR IMAGINATION.  The Modern Fables take on a pick-your-own-adventure played out in your mind.  Can you uncover the secrets MEDOGAN has to offer?  Can you escape the confines of reality?

Brought to you under lockdown in London during the COVID19 outbreak, Modern Fables Escape Rooms brings you MEDOGAN.  This episodic adventure is set in the forgotten town of MEDOGAN,  the epicentre of the Modern Fables universe.

-------------------------------------------------

You're due to get married and your best mate has requested you meet to plan your last pre-wedding jolly.  So, you get in your car, stick some tunes on and make your way to the Hawthorne Inn in MEDOGAN...

-------------------------------------------------

Made by the Modern Fables team:

Art - Ed Naujokas

Audio - Jay Harris

Programming - Richard Sherriff

Writing - Jonny Gillam
